channel.title: Prayer Draining!
channel.description:
Alright so I think I found a fix for my prayer draining so fast.
[code] double[] curseData = { 0.6, // Protect Item 1, // Sap Warrior 1, // Sap Range 1, // Sap Mage 1, // Sap Spirit 1, // Berserker 2, // Deflect Summoning 2, // Deflect Mage 7 2, // Deflect Range 8 2, // Deflect Melee 9 2, // Leech Attack 2, // Leech Range 2, // Leech Mage 2, // Leech Defence 2, // Leech Strength 2, // Leech Energy 2, // Leech Special 2, // Wrath 4, // Soul Split 5, // Turmoil };[/code]
Would this be it? I have not tested or changed anything yet but I just want to know if this is for changing on how fast the prayer drains for curses.

item.title: Prayer Draining!
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

Alright so I think I found a fix for my prayer draining so fast.

double[] curseData = { 0.6, // Protect Item 1, // Sap Warrior 1, // Sap Range 1, // Sap Mage 1, // Sap Spirit 1, // Berserker 2, // Deflect Summoning 2, // Deflect Mage 7 2, // Deflect Range 8 2, // Deflect Melee 9 2, // Leech Attack 2, // Leech Range 2, // Leech Mage 2, // Leech Defence 2, // Leech Strength 2, // Leech Energy 2, // Leech Special 2, // Wrath 4, // Soul Split 5, // Turmoil };

Would this be it? I have not tested or changed anything yet but I just want to know if this is for changing on how fast the prayer drains for curses.
